summary: App includes a "My Work" section intended to display embedded/linked YouTube videos (Shorts and standard YouTube link).
known_issues: "Failed to load work items" error in the app causes videos in the "My Work" section not to show.

existing_features.title: Fix the 'Failed to load work items' error so the My Work section can display work videos reliably.
Add the user-provided YouTube video links as work items under the My Work section title 'My Work' and render them as embedded videos.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add provided YouTube video links to the "My Work" section under the title "My Work"

projectName: Fix 'Failed to load work items' and ensure provided YouTube videos render in My Work section
